name: Heavenly Instrument, Hydromonica
text:
T: Put the top card of your main on the bottom of your main deck.
2,
T,banish this card: Search your main deck for a card. Then shuffle your main deck and put that card on top of your main deck. If your J/ruler is "Songtress of Shangri-La" or "Coup d'Etat Mastermind, Shion", you may pay 1 less to play this ability.
Discard another card named "Heavenly Instrument, Hydromonica": Draw a card.
